stories.text:
Not necessary all of the technological goods are actually for the benefit of people: some of them do prove obsessive behavior in some of us.

Why this happens - only guessable: escalation of inside harm towards self which spreads through the whole life may be healable by choosing a different path which caused current situation.

It may be escalated due to tech, but most probably due to sticking to tech for too long, without producing meaningful results (however valuing the path).

I am sharing the video which resonated the thought, enlightening the harm.

https://youtu.be/6CKZpJb36hs
